table_description: AWS Step Functions State Machine Execution History

columns.name: id
columns.description: The id of the event.

columns.name: execution_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the execution.

columns.name: previous_event_id
columns.description: The id of the previous event.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: The date and time the event occurred.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the event.

columns.name: activity_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an activity that failed during an execution.

columns.name: activity_schedule_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an activity schedule event that failed during an execution.

columns.name: activity_scheduled_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an activity scheduled during an execution.

columns.name: activity_started_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about the start of an activity during an execution.

columns.name: activity_succeeded_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an activity that successfully terminated during an execution.

columns.name: activity_timed_out_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an activity timeout that occurred during an execution.

columns.name: execution_aborted_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an abort of an execution.

columns.name: execution_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an execution failure event.

columns.name: execution_started_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about the start of the execution.

columns.name: execution_succeeded_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about the successful termination of the execution.

columns.name: execution_timed_out_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about the execution timeout that occurred during the execution.

columns.name: lambda_function_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a lambda function that failed during an execution.

columns.name: lambda_function_schedule_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a failed lambda function schedule event that occurred during an execution.

columns.name: lambda_function_scheduled_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a lambda function scheduled during an execution.

columns.name: lambda_function_start_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a lambda function that failed to start during an execution.

columns.name: lambda_function_succeeded_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a lambda function that terminated successfully during an execution.

columns.name: lambda_function_timed_out_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a lambda function timeout that occurred during an execution.

columns.name: map_iteration_aborted_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an iteration of a Map state that was aborted.

columns.name: map_iteration_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an iteration of a Map state that failed.

columns.name: map_iteration_started_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an iteration of a Map state that was started.

columns.name: map_iteration_succeeded_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an iteration of a Map state that succeeded.

columns.name: map_state_started_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about Map state that was started.

columns.name: state_entered_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a state entered during an execution.

columns.name: state_exited_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about an exit from a state during an execution.

columns.name: task_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about the failure of a task.

columns.name: task_scheduled_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a task that was scheduled.

columns.name: task_start_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a task that failed to start.

columns.name: task_started_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a task that was started.

columns.name: task_submit_failed_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a task that where the submit failed.

columns.name: task_submitted_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a submitted task.

columns.name: task_succeeded_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a task that succeeded.

columns.name: task_timed_out_event_details
columns.description: Contains details about a task that timed out.
